oai_dc:dc.dc:descriptions: The admiration of Bushman women for the horse. The sound of the cantering of horses imitated by them. By /han≠kass’o (L VIII.-31. 8737-8740).
The people say that the horse canters, or dances because it feels proud on account of the women's admiration.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: How the Bushman women show their admiration for the horse
